T02D1216:323b-1: aashta shma sha n'a khya ta n'a ma /
T02D1216:323b-3: dur khrod brgyad kyi bshad pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1216:323b-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1216:323b-5: de la dur khrod brgyad bshad par bya ste /
T02D1216:323b-6: shar phyogs kyi dur khrod ni gtum drag ces bya ste /
T02D1216:324a-0: der aa ru ra'i shing la bdag nyid chen po gtum drag @324a * //
T02D1216:324a-1: ces bya ba mdog dkar po glang po che'i mdog can no //
T02D1216:324a-2: shing gi drung du ni phyogs kyi bdag po dbang
T02D1216:324a-3: po mdog ser po lag pa g-yas g-yon na rdo
T02D1216:324a-4: rje dang sdigs mdzub thogs pa glang po che sa
T02D1216:324a-5: srung dkar po la zhon pa ste /
T02D1216:324a-6: der klu ba su ki mdog ser po dang /
T02D1216:324a-7: sprin sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba mdog sngon po'o //
T02D1216:324a-8: byang phyogs kyi dur khrod ni /
T02D1216:324a-9: tshang tshing can zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1216:324a-10: der ni byang chub kyi shing la /
T02D1216:324a-11: bdag nyid chen po ba ga ra zhes bya ba /
T02D1216:324a-14: shing gi drung du ni phyogs kyi bdag po lus ngan mdog ser po /
T02D1216:324a-15: lag pa g-yas g-yon gyis mi 'jigs pa dang /
T02D1216:324a-16: gha ha thogs pa thung zhing gter la bzhon pa ste /
T02D1216:324a-19: sprin rmugs pa zhes bya ba mdog dkar po'o //
T02D1216:324a-20: nub phyogs kyi dur khrod ni 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i keng rus zhes bya ste /
T02D1216:324a-21: der shing mya ngan med la bdag nyid chen po 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i keng rus zhes bya ba /
T02D1216:324a-24: shing gi drung du ni phyogs kyi bdag po ba
T02D1216:324a-25: ru na mdog dkar po chu srin la zhon pa
T02D1216:324a-26: / lag pa g-yas g-yon gyis sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa thogs pa ste /
T02D1216:324a-27: der klu stobs kyi rgyu mdog ljang gu dang /
T02D1216:324a-28: sprin drag po zhes bya ba mdog dkar po'o //
T02D1216:324a-29: lho phyogs kyi dur khrod na 'jigs sde zhes bya ste /
T02D1216:324a-30: der ba ru ra'i shing la bdag nyid chen po
T02D1216:324a-31: 'jigs sde zhes bya ba'i mi'i gdong can mdog nag
T02D1216:324a-32: po'o // shing gi drung du ni phyogs kyi bdag
T02D1216:324a-33: po gshin rje mdog nag po lag pa g-yas g-yon
T02D1216:324a-34: gyis dbyig pa dang zhags pa thogs pa ma he
T02D1216:324a-36: der klu pad mdog dkar po dang /
T02D1216:324a-37: sprin 'khrigs pa zhes bya ba mdog ser po'o //
T02D1216:324a-38: me lha'i mtshams kyi dur khrod ni dpal gyi nags zhes bya ste /
T02D1216:324a-39: der shing ka ranydza zhes bya ba la bdag nyid
T02D1216:324a-40: chen po dpal gyi nags zhes bya ba ra'i gdong
T02D1216:324a-42: shing gi drung du ni phyogs kyi bdag po byin
T02D1216:324a-43: za mdog dmar po lag pa g-yas g-yon na bgrang
T02D1216:324a-44: phreng dang ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa ra'i steng
T02D1216:324a-46: der klu padma chen po mdor dkar po dang /
T02D1216:324b-0: sprin 'khyil pa zhes bya ba @324b mdog dmar po'o //
T02D1216:324b-1: bden bral gyi dur khrod ni 'jigs pa'i mun pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1216:324b-2: der au dumw'a ra'i shing la bdag nyid chen po
T02D1216:324b-3: 'jigs pa zhes bya ba ma he'i gdong can mdog
T02D1216:324b-4: nag po'o // shing gi drung du ni phyogs kyi
T02D1216:324b-5: bdag po srin po bden bral mdog nag po lag
T02D1216:324b-6: pa g-yas g-yon gyis sdigs mdzub dang mi mgo thogs
T02D1216:324b-7: pa mi ro la zhon pa ste /
T02D1216:324b-8: der klu mtha' yas mdog sngon po dang /
T02D1216:324b-9: sprin sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba mdog ser po'o //
T02D1216:324b-10: rlung gi mtshams kyi dur khrod ni k'i li k'i lar sgrogs pa zhes bya ste /
T02D1216:324b-11: der ni shing srid sgrub ces bya ba la bdag
T02D1216:324b-12: nyid chen po k'i li k'i lar sgrogs pa zhes
T02D1216:324b-13: bya ba ma he'i gdong can du ba'i mdog can
T02D1216:324b-14: no // shing gi drung du ni phyogs kyi bdag
T02D1216:324b-15: po rlung lha mdog dkar po lag pa g-yas g-yon
T02D1216:324b-16: gyis rlung gi snam bu 'dzin pa ri dags sha
T02D1216:324b-18: der klu rigs ldan khra bo dang sprin 'bebs pa zhes bya ba mdog ljang gu'o //
T02D1216:324b-19: byang shar gyi dur khrod ni ha har dgod pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1216:324b-20: der shing n+ya gro dha la bdag nyid chen po
T02D1216:324b-21: ha har dgod pa zhes bya ste khyu mchog gi
T02D1216:324b-23: shing gi drung du ni phyogs kyi bdag po dbang
T02D1216:324b-24: ldan mdog sngo skya lag pa g-yas g-yon gyis mdung
T02D1216:324b-25: rtse gsum pa dang thod pa thogs pa khyu mchog
T02D1216:324b-27: der klu dung skyong ser po dang /
T02D1216:324b-28: sprin gtum mo zhes bya ba mdog sna tshogs pa'o //
T02D1216:324b-29: phyogs kyi bdag po thams cad ni mi'i gdong can lag pa gnyis pa'o //
T02D1216:324b-30: phyogs kyi klu rnams ni gdengs ka bdun pa mche
T02D1216:324b-31: ba yid tsam gtsigs shing 'dod pa'i gzugs can no
T02D1216:324b-32: // sprin rnams kyang kha dog sna tshogs pa'i mdog can no //
T02D1216:324b-33: gtum drag dang ni tshang tshing dang //
T02D1216:324b-35: 'jigs sde rnams ni shar la sogs //
T02D1216:324b-36: phyogs su yongs su bskor te gnas //
T02D1216:324b-37: ha har dgod pa dang ldan te //
T02D1216:324b-38: dpal gyi nags na byin za'o //
T02D1216:324b-39: 'jigs pa'i mun pa bden bral te //
T02D1216:324b-40: rlung mtshams k'i li k'i lar sgrogs //
T02D1216:324b-41: 'di ni dur khrod brgyad po ste //
T02D1216:324b-42: dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1216:324b-43: rdo rje ra ba'i nang logs su //
T02D1216:324b-44: rab tu 'bad de bsam par bya //
T02D1216:325a-1: dpon rnal 'byor pas mdzad pa'i dur khrod brgyad kyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1216:325a-3: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po buddha ka ra badzra dang /
